Sentencas: A new series of La2-xGdxNiO4+delta (0.0 <= x <= 0.6) synthesized via formate pyrolysis were tested as potential cathode materials for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of La2-xGdxNiO4+δ (0.0 ≤x≤ 0.6) cathode materials for SOFC applications

Sentencas: It was found that the materials are single-phase up to x = 0.5 and crystallize in a tetragonal structure (I4/mmm space group).
Titulo: Structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of La2-xGdxNiO4+δ (0.0 ≤x≤ 0.6) cathode materials for SOFC applications

Sentencas: They show superior oxygen over-stoichiometry values, delta, to those of both the undoped lanthanum nickelate and the one doped with alkali-earth elements.
Titulo: Structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of La2-xGdxNiO4+δ (0.0 ≤x≤ 0.6) cathode materials for SOFC applications

Sentencas: To satisfy the requirements for the increased efficiency and durability of SOFCs, chemical and thermo-mechanical compatibility between the cathode materials developed and a Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 solid-state electrolyte was studied.
Titulo: Structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of La2-xGdxNiO4+δ (0.0 ≤x≤ 0.6) cathode materials for SOFC applications

Sentencas: Concentration dependences of electrical and thermal properties of the La2-xGdxNiO4+delta compounds were discussed in interrelation with their structural peculiarities and the temperature behavior of delta.
Titulo: Structure, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity of La2-xGdxNiO4+δ (0.0 ≤x≤ 0.6) cathode materials for SOFC applications
